name: UUUU for the iPhone
description:
UUUU for iPhone 5, 5C, 5S and iPod Touch 5

UUUU. Action, Puzzle, Colors, Monotouch, Accelerating colors, Sounds and Colors that are falling down and you should stop them from doing that.

Monotouch. Using cutting edge technology we created a game that you can play by using a single finger. Very advanced space rocket technology.

Procedural. The game is different each time you play it. Colors, Sounds and gameplay differs every time, and you need to adapt as quickly as possible, to avoid any unnecessary color spillage. Who would want to waste such beautiful color?

Finger resource. Since UUUU is a revolutionary monotouch game, your single finger is your main strategic resource. Do you use it to manually hold off the colors, to create new boosters, or maybe some unique approach?

Text. Text is boring and in UUUU you will find absolutely no text, just symbol, sounds, and did we mention colors?

Colors. Unlike penguins, pandas, snow, and very old TVs.

Why are you still reading the description? It's black and white. You need color to compensate for this monochromatic reading experience - we have just the game for that. And it's this one.

This app does NOT play nice with the iPad... yet!
